Looking for an Audi A4 near Washington?

The Audi A4 has rightfully earned its place among elite entry-level luxury sport sedans. Styling is always fresh and ahead of the curve, while interior material quality is second to none. With the largest selection of cars from dealers and private sellers, Autotrader can help find the perfect A4 for you.

Autotrader has 931 Audi A4s for sale near Washington, DC, including a Used 2011 Audi A4 2.0T Premium, a Used 2011 Audi A4 2.0T Premium Plus Avant, and a Used 2011 Audi A4 2.0T Premium Plus quattro Sdn.
